description: Welcome to Payments Initiation API. Feel free to create a sandbox, by replacing the sandbox id with a unique id.

security.description: A guid that uniquely identifies your application
security.name: Client-Id

parameters.description: The unique name of your Sandbox

parameters.description: Signature (Detached JWS signature)

parameters.name: TPP-Signature-Certificate
parameters.description: TPP-Signature-Certificate (X.509 certificate in .pem format)

parameters.name: X-Certificate-Check
parameters.description: A Boolean to enable or disable the certificate validation

description: This POST call generates a consent id. To have access to consent UI, you need the consent id. To create it, you need to provide your sandbox id, your access token, and a random UUID.

description: In this part of the API, you can plan scheduled payments between National Bank of Greece accounts, using the 11-digit account number. To plan your scheduled payments, you need to provide your sandbox id, your access token, your consent id, and a random UUID.
